title: Tanvi's Party
description: Tanvi is an affluent young woman who is an adventurer at heart. Tanvi organizes a party along with her friend, Natasha, where things get heated up. Will things get out of hand at Tanvi's party? Read this latest book in the 'Edge of Ecstasy' series from Chetna Khanna to know more.
author: Chetna Khanna
